entry.title: All about pedagogical content knowledge(PCK)
entry.content:
PCK is a kind of teacher knowledge and beliefs which enable teachers to help students to learn a particular topic-related knowledge easily. Lots of reasearcher have do lots of studies of PCK. Here I collect some web links which may be useful for students and researchers who are now studying PCK.

1. PCK Groups
Google Group For PCK：https://groups.google.com/group/sciedu Diigo Group For PCK：http://groups.diigo.com/groups/pck-club Twitter Group For PCK：you can follow @pckclub on twitter, and send direct message to @pckclub to disscuss PCK.
